name: Christmas Shootout (mattyg763)
description:
Santa has gotten desperate for gifts. He is out to take yours. Defend your gifts at all costs.

I hope you enjoy my first game. If you have any feedback please let me know. 

Disclaimer: The Santa, deer and gift sprites are not mine. All praise should go to the original owner. (I can't seem to find them right now, when I do I will edit this page with their name.)
